bibl.title: Cohors XX Palmyrenorum - An Alternative Explanation of the Numeral.
bibl.note: "I am inclined to favour the possibility that the cohors XX Palmyrenorum [cf. P. Dura, pp. 22-46] was so numbered because, at the time of its formation, there were already 19 cohorts in Syria."
Kennedy David L., Cohors XX Palmyrenorum - An Alternative Explanation of the Numeral.
